thread.title: Real Time Pain Relief Announces Sponsorship of Top 10 Professional Bull Rider Cody Nance
thread.title_full: Real Time Pain Relief Announces Sponsorship of Top 10 Professional Bull Rider Cody Nance - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Real Time Pain Relief Announces Sponsorship of Top 10 Professional Bull Rider Cody Nance
text:
Makers of the popular rub-on pain relief lotion and products, Real Time Pain Relief, announce the sponsorship of Tennessee native Cody Nance, a fan favorite of the Professional Bull Riders. Nance’s continued success has him headed to the PBR World Finals after a strong second place finish this month at the BluDef tour finals in Louisville, Kentucky.
Edmond, OK (PRWEB) October 20, 2015
Real Time Pain Relief , makers of the popular rub-on pain relief lotion and products, today announced that professional bull rider Cody Nance has signed an official endorsement deal with the company. Nance is a fan favorite and a top performer. He’s headed into the PBR World Finals in 11th position after a strong second place finish this month at the BluDef tour finals in Louisville, Kentucky. The Tennessee native is a consistent top 10 rider and also has ridden for the past two years at the American Rodeo and Calgary Stampede. He was the PBR Rookie of the Year in 2009 and has had numerous wins on the Built Ford Tough, BluDef Velocity and Touring Pro tours over the years. Nance is proud to be a member of the Real Time Cowboys team, while his other sponsors include Tandy Leather, Panhandle Slim, War Pony Energy, 5.11 Tactical, Rock and Roll Cowboy, Bucking Bull Pro, Skull Tec, and Ink Billy Style Custom Western Products. Fans can connect with Nance by Liking him on Facebook or Following him on Twitter at @CodyNancePBR or on Instagram at codywnance.
As a professional bull rider, Nance adheres to a strict training regimen to keep his body in the absolute best condition to ride bulls and promote recovery. As Nance states, “I’m excited to be sponsored by Real Time Pain Relief because it works really well to reduce my inflammation, therefore promoting better circulation. The better my circulation - the better my recovery. Real Time Pain Relief helps me stay in the game.”
“Real Time Pain Relief is thrilled to have Cody join our Real Time Cowboys – he’s an amazing athlete,” said Real Time Pain Relief Founder Tim Flatt. “In addition to being one of the top bull riders, he’s also been a user of Real Time Pain Relief for a while. Plus his strong character, tireless dedication to his sport, fans and sponsors, makes us truly proud to sponsor this all-American bull rider as he ascends his way to the top.”
For more information on Nance’s newest sponsor, Real Time Pain Relief, visit http://www.rtpr.com .
About Real Time Pain Relief (RTPR)
Founded in 1998, Real Time Pain Relief (RTPR) is a family-owned and operated American company with all products made in the USA. The company’s topical pain relief lotion, known for being the best-smelling rub-on, provides natural pain relief to people with arthritis, back pain and muscle strains. Over the past 17 years, RTPR has introduced several new products to market based on the specific needs of their customers, including Real Time Sports Cream, Real Time Skin Rescue, Real Time Foot Cream, Real Time Hand Cream, convenient travel packs, a 100% vegan product Real Time Pain Relief SELECT, and most recently MAXX Glide. Real Time Pain Relief is an FDA registered OTC, pain relief product. Visit http://www.rtpr.com for more information about Real Time Pain Relief.
